about_the_game:
Sunya is an enchanting pixel art platformer that embarks you on an exhilarating quest to seek, gather, and wield the immense powers of the four elements: air, earth, water, and fire. The gameplay revolves around the concept of elemental switching, granting players the ability to transform into different elemental forms at will. Each form possesses unique traits and abilities, enabling you to adapt to various situations and overcome intricate obstacles.

As you traverse through this world, a mysterious force attentively observes your every action. As you grow in strength and expertise, you draw nearer to uncovering the truth behind this force and the purpose behind the obstacles had to face.
